directions: In a punch bowl, combine pineapple juice concentrate, orange juice concentrate and vodka. Pour in lemon-lime soda. Float cherries and orange slices on top. Add ice before serving.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can frozen pineapple juice concentrate
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
2 (2 liter) bottles lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, chilled
title: Party Punch IV
